name: unirestss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl6eqss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cuni(c0), cin(cuni(c0), c1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cuni(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
-| wss(cin(cuni(c0), c1), cuni(c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cuni(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
-| wss(cin(cuni(c0), c1), cuni(c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cin(cuni(c0), c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cuni(c0)))
-| wss(cin(cuni(c0), c1), cuni(c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))

|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c1)), cuni(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))

comment: The union of an elementwise intersection is a subset of the underlying set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
